desc: Evin is a registered and certified family health brand. We currently stock baby products, medical wearables, oral care products and others. You can find us at most leading pharmacies in Malaysia

layout.text:
Kangaroo care is to embrace a naked baby against a parent’s bare chest. It helps! Clinically proven.
As fellow Papa & Mama, we'd like to share every bit we may know with you. We included Kangaroo Care tips on all our breastpumps. This idea of sharing in joy and knowledge is our purpose and hence, our logo.
